UNTDID6245Type.title: Temperature type code qualifier
UNTDID6245Type.description:
Code qualifying the type of a temperature.

Applicable codes:
* '1' - Storage temperature
* '2' - Transport temperature
* '3' - Cargo operating temperature
* '4' - Transport emergency temperature
* '5' - Transport control temperature
* '6' - Boiling point
* '7' - Temperature, recorded
* '8' - Self-accelerating decomposition temperature (SADT)
* '9' - Self-accelerating polymerization temperature (SAPT)
